Subject: Character Submitions
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

From: KSLawdogg@...

Character Submitions:


Bumblebee

Gender: Male
Beast Mode: Bumblebee
Side: Predacon

Character History:

After 20 years of life, Bumblebee joined PredaTech Labs, owned by Koga Shuko, 
and was positioned at a lab as a guard.  After a few months, he learned that 
the lab was working with gestalt technology.  On the 500th anniversary of 
independence for the USA, the Oblitercons broke out, killing almost every 
personel and destroying the lab.  Bumblebee was one of the only survivors.  A 
little while later, he was recruited on an unidentifed mission to an 
unidentified planet.  The convoy would be led by Koga Shuko himself, along 
with Set, a business partner and wealthy Predacon.  He was put in a stasis 
pod for safe-keeping, but due to an asteroid storm, the Predacon ship 
crashed, a few stasis pods gettings out, one of them Bumblebee's.  Now, 
looking for new and better oppertunities, Bumblebee will make a formidable 
foe.

Character Personality:

His stick-too-it-evness gets him in good graces with his leaders, just the 
way he likes it!  He's a soldier, and he follows orders no matter what, even 
if it will cost him his life.  He hates Maximals, and will not utter to show 
no mercy when executing them.

Character Stats:

Function: Warrior

Strength: 6.0
Intelligence: 8
Speed: 6.0
Endurance: 7
Rank: 4.0
Firepower: 7.5
Skill: 9.0

Beast Mode Description:

Bumblebee's beast mode is simple, a giant bumblebee.  5 ft long, 3 ft wide, 
and 4 ft high, a massive stinger on the end of his 'thorax' stays, sharp as 
Hell and just as deadly, being 5 ft long.  In this mode, his communication 
and sensors are much better.

Robot Mode Description:

In robot mode, he is very similar to Waspinator's, only he is '6"6, and has 
two stinger missile launchers.  He shoots blue optic beams from his optic 
sensors, and can take flight in this mode (as well as his beast mode).  With 
a red Predacon insignia on his yellow and black chest, he doesn't care who 
sees it.  Just as long as they see it before he kills them!



Name: Scattershot
Gender: Male
Beast Mode: Bald Eagle
Side: Alliance

Character History:

Raised in the suburbs of Iacon, in 2303, at the young age of 76, he began his 
murder spree.  Killing several Humans, and over 50 Maximals, this Predacon 
has been through several mental wards, though each he broke out of and killed 
a few more Maximals and even Predacons in the process.  Soon, these acts 
brought the amused attention of Koga Shuko, CEO of PredTech Labs, a very 
wealthy company. Going on a mission with him, he was put in a stasis pod (so 
he didn't kill the entire crew!).  But when the asteroids hit the ship, he 
was knocked out of the craft, and hit Earth, then joined the Alliance, and 
continues to be a crazy freak of nature.

Character Personality: 

A real serial killer, Scattershot is just plain psychotic.  He has been noted 
as a pyromaniac, and has been accounted of 18 counts of arson, and is 
supsected of over 20 more.  If he can get alone with a Maximal, he will 
torture and kill one.  He respects authority, believing if no one takes 
orders, all the world would plunge into a chaos, of course, wherever he goes, 
that happens either way.  He loves to see flames, and with his knowledge of 
bombs (he's been accounted for blowing up a few buildings), he gets what he 
wants.

Character Stats:

Function: Ground Trooper/Warrior/Explosives Expert
  
Strength: 7.96
Intelligence: 8.0
Speed: 3.0
Endurance: 9.0
Rank: 7.0
Firewpower: 6.0
Skill: 10.0

Beast Mode Description:

A normal, brown and white bald eagle is this psychotic robot's beast mode.  
Only the beak can tear through metal, just as easily as a real eagle can tear 
through flesh, and the talons are almost as deadly.  In the back wing 
feathers, are small rockets, which can boost his speed up for a few 
milli-cycles (seconds, supposedly).

Robot Mode Description:

A mix of brown, white, yellow, black, green, violet, turqouise, and EVEN 
pink, he does not hide well.  He used to be just plain green, but he thought 
that was too dull, and the masses had to be shown something else.  On the 
tips of all eleven (an extra finger on the left hand) fingers are deadly 
talons.  His portruding beak is still showable, even in this mode.  His 
optics can see great distances, in both modes.  He has no visible insignias 
on his body, not wanting to pollute his body.  In his right hand, he carries 
a automatic rifle, firing explosive 'bullets', in the other hand is an 
energon knife.  In subspace he carries a variety of tools for torture, bomb 
equipment, charges, a missile launcher, and a few laser pistols.


Name: Punch / Counter Punch (One robot, Counter Punch is another robot mode)
Gender: Male/Male
Beast Mode: Kangaroo / Dingo
Side: Alliance/Predacon

Character History:

Punch was created in Cybertron for one purpose, spying.  Though, he became a 
double agent.  Several dozen years later, he was found out, and the Predacon 
Alliance came after him.  Stealing a Human craft, he set off for Past Earth, 
where he hoped Hell Beast or some powerful warlord would find a great use for 
his services.  Getting caught in the ship debris from Koga Shuko and Set's 
ship, he crash landed on Earth.  Now, using his other robot mode, Counter 
Punch, he spies on both Alliance and Predacon alike.

Character Personality:

Both of his modes are cold and desolate, with no mercy.  They love to fight, 
but love to spy better.  Any dirt they can find, they save until it's needed. 
 

Character Stats:

Function: Triplechanger and Double Agent

Strength: 7.0/6.0
Intelligence: 6.0/5.0
Speed: 4.0/3.0
Endurance: 6.54/6.9
Rank: 5.0/5.0
Firewpower: 6.4/7.5
Skill: 10.0/10.0

Beast Mode Description:

The kangaroo mode for Punch, the Alliance member of the two other modes, is a 
typical Australian kangaroo, with, like all marsupials, has a pouch.  This 
can be used for Punch to store things like shiny objects, disks, and even 
weapons.

The dingo mode of Counter Punch, the other mode of the two, is a typical 
dingo.  Striped on the back, with tannish fur.  His teeth and claws are a 
deadly combination, and his ears, sight, and eyes are extremely good, 
allowing him to hear, see, and smell just about everything that goes on 
around him.

Robot Mode Description:

Punch:

Punch is a blue robot with no symbols on him.  He has a single red optic band 
on his face, which can zoom in things to be 1000X.  Over his mouth is face 
plate.  His hands and feet are all black, giving him a nice mix of colors.  
In his hands he carries a plasma cannon, in subspace he has a sword and a 
laser pistol and a laser rifle.

Counter Punch:

Gray and red, like his 'brother', Counter Punch has a red optic band, and a 
face plate.  His band also has the same special ability, to zoom things into 
a 1000X view.  His chest is gray, and his abdomen is white.  His arms and 
legs white, his feet and hands gray.  In his left hand he carries a photon 
rifle, and in subspace he has an energon knife, a plasma pistol, and a rocket 
launcher.
